headline.print_headline: Hotel: Rent a Room or the Entire Island

docs.snippet: For the first time, the Cuckolds — a pair of granite islands a half mile off the coast of Southport Island, Maine — will be open to guests for overnight stays....
docs.abstract: For the first time, the Cuckolds — a pair of granite islands a half mile off the coast of Southport Island, Maine — will be open to guests for overnight stays.

headline.print_headline: Basketball Star Wells Settles Suit Against Xavier
headline.main: Basketball Star Wells Settles Suit Against Xavier

docs.snippet: A former Xavier University basketball player who was expelled over what he says was a false rape allegation has settled his lawsuit against the Cincinnati school over its handling of the case....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former Xavier University basketball player who was expelled over what he says was a false rape allegation has settled his lawsuit against the Cincinnati school over its handling of the case.

headline.print_headline: North Dakota Finds More Radioactive Oil Waste
headline.main: North Dakota Finds More Radioactive Oil Waste

docs.snippet: North Dakota confirmed Thursday the discovery of a new radioactive dump of waste from oil drilling, and separately a company hired to clean up waste found in February at another location said it removed double the amount of radioactive material or...
docs.lead_paragraph: North Dakota confirmed Thursday the discovery of a new radioactive dump of waste from oil drilling, and separately a company hired to clean up waste found in February at another location said it removed double the amount of radioactive material originally estimated to be there.

headline.print_headline: Phelps Beaten in First Comeback Final
headline.main: Phelps Beaten in First Comeback Final

docs.snippet: Michael Phelps suffered a narrow loss to his old rival Ryan Lochte in his comeback to competitive swimming on Thursday, but still showed enough to suggest he will be a force to be reckoned with....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps suffered a narrow loss to his old rival Ryan Lochte in his comeback to competitive swimming on Thursday, but still showed enough to suggest he will be a force to be reckoned with.

headline.print_headline: Pellet Gun Firing Causes Navy Base Lockdown
headline.main: Pellet Gun Firing Causes Navy Base Lockdown

docs.snippet: A major Navy base ground to a halt for more than two hours Thursday after a sailor waved a weapon from a sixth-floor barracks room that turned out to be a pellet gun used for recreational purposes, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A major Navy base ground to a halt for more than two hours Thursday after a sailor waved a weapon from a sixth-floor barracks room that turned out to be a pellet gun used for recreational purposes, officials said.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Seeks $700,000 in Illegal Proceeds Traced to Ex-South Korea Leader
headline.main: U.S. Seeks $700,000 in Illegal Proceeds Traced to Ex-South Korea Leader

docs.snippet: The U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday it has sued in court to recover $700,000 in alleged corruption proceeds traced to former South Korean President Chun Doo-Hwan....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday it has sued in court to recover $700,000 in alleged corruption proceeds traced to former South Korean President Chun Doo-Hwan.

headline.print_headline: Michelle Obama Changes Kansas Speech Date After Students Protest
headline.main: Michelle Obama Changes Kansas Speech Date After Students Protest

docs.snippet: First lady Michelle Obama has switched her plans to address a high school commencement ceremony in Topeka, Kansas, in May after students protested that her presence would limit the number of family members they could invite to the ceremony....
docs.lead_paragraph: First lady Michelle Obama has switched her plans to address a high school commencement ceremony in Topeka, Kansas, in May after students protested that her presence would limit the number of family members they could invite to the ceremony.
